title: Purpose
description:
The purpose of the processing describes what the reason why the controller processes the personal data

(ex : Customer relationship management, Payroll management, Maintenance of medical records, Creditworthiness assessment)

description.description: Provides additional information on the purpose

isMain.description: Specifies whether the purpose is the main purpose or an accessory purpose

dataCategories.description: The dataCategories processed for the purpose of the processing
